name: Stonephonia
description:
Envisioned in a dream (whilst napping to the music of Hiroshi Yoshimura), Stonephonia explores concerns of aging, impermanence, the passage of time and the impact (or lack of) that our actions have on the universe around us.

Attempt to solve the puzzle using the visual and audio cues, or simply enjoy a peaceful moment to reflect on where you find yourself in life and in time as a whole.

Controls:

  • Arrows to move
  • Space to push
  • F11 to fullscreen

Credits:

  • August Dahlkvist - Music and SFX AugsEU OST
  • Font - 04b03
